website_summaries.verdict: A durable set made from recycled plastic that has a nice shape and size and is safe for food.
pros: Comes in gender neutral color option
Good size on the pot and tea cups
Thick and solid quality on this product
cons: The sugar bowl has a couple of small holes, making it impractical to actually hold grain sugar

customer_reviews.title: Strong Perfume Smell
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed that when I received my tea pot set that is had a really strong perfume scent/ fabric softener scent. I washed it three times and the scent would not go away so I called Amazon and they quickly sent out a new one. Amazons customer service was great! They even offered a refund but I chose to try again. However, the second one had the same scent. It must be a Green toys company issue. I called them and they said that they haven't heard of their teapots smelling like this before. Overall disappointed and don't feel comfortable using it or giving it away free. The colors and design are great but isn't getting any use :(.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea set, BEST quality too!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely my favorite little tea set! It is perfect for my sweet little toddler who loves to make tea for everyone! I love that everything is made of recycled materials, its great quality, and its cute too! I LOVE Green Toys and this tea set is no exception. If you are looking for a high quality, adorable tea set for your little one, I highly recommend. I love watching my sweet little one play tea party with this special tea-set. (December 2017: UPDATE: STILL A FAVORITE. We have bought this Green Toys Tea Set for several other children we love it so much!) Was this review helpful?
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: After washing the set and getting ready to have a ...
customer_reviews.text: After washing the set and getting ready to have a tea party, we smelled an extremely strong perfume scent from inside the teapot. We lifted the lid and were shocked by the odor's strength. It still reeks of this scent today. No other pieces had this strong smell. How can this be a "green" product"?
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Heavy chemical smells- would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with this toy. It’s well constructed, but the teapot that came in our set smelled heavily of fabric softener. Any water put inside came out tasting like fabric softener too. Amazon did refund me so no complaints there. I contacted the manufacturer directly to try and get just the teapot replaced because my daughter loves the toy. I was told they’d send me a new one, but a month has gone by and I’ve received nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dulang

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for this quality
customer_reviews.text: I will continue buying this brand for its quality. The only thing I don't like is the purple container is so small I cannot pick up the lid by holding the nob on the top of the lid. But my toddler's fingers are small and he has no trouble doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: There's a hole in the sugar bowl, dear Liza
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tea set that can be used with real tea and then washed easily and thoroughly. Colors are pleasant and gender neutral enough that my son doesn't object to having a tea party with his sister. Two points of note: 1. The plastic material is so slippery that I have a hard time holding or picking up the lids. 2. Why are there 2 small holes in the bottom of the sugar bowl??? Some underhanded scheme by the sugar cube industry??? Maybe you're just supposed to use pretend sugar, but I live with a 3 year old realist.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the Green Toys brand. I got this set for my niece as a gift as well as the matching cupcake set. She loves it and her and her brother play for a few hours with these every day. The imaginative play is so great at this age (ages 2 and 4) and this tea set helps foster that kind of play. They are nice quality and durable. This will be something that will be able to be handed down to some new kids to play with when the time comes. Great gift idea for someone else or your own kids.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyA

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3-year-old daughter few months ago, and it is still one of the toys that she plays with quite regularly. The set is very durable and has nice soft colors (I personally don't like super bright colors for toys as they make the toy look cheap), and the plastic has a nice quality to it. We also used them with sensory bins and it was a great hit both for my 3-year-old and 18-month-old so far.
customer_reviews.author: pinar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Darling Set
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy this set is. We had a previous tea set made from cheap plastic and several pieces broke. Not this set - very sturdy and strong. I believe I could stand on the pieces and they'd be fine. The ONLY issue that bothered me is that the "sugar" jar has a small hole in the bottom (not a defect, I'm sure it was made this way) but it makes it so you can't put sugar in the jar. I've been putting small, dehydrated marshmallows in there instead - Daughter is happy, so it doesn't matter; heaven knows marshmallows are easier to clean up than sugar anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for First Tea Set! ECO Friendly!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect tea set for first timers. I gave this to my grand daughter when she was 2. She has since graduated to more sophisticated tea sets, but still plays with this one in the tub or pool! The colors are pretty, very durable, dishwasher safe (I think, we hand wash these,) and the best part is the set is eco friendly - made of recycled plastics. We need to be buying more things like this, folks - we are killing Mother Earth with all this plastic out there. Do a doubly good deed and buy your wee one this set. ♥
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Dishwasher Safe, Heat Tolerant
customer_reviews.text: My son and I like to have tea parties with real tea, but I didn't want him to break my china so I bought him this. It is a great set, he loves to pour his own teapot and drink real tea and I love that it is dishwasher safe! I also love that it is multi colored so not super girly. I am confused as to why the sugar bowl has a hole in the bottom of it though? I taped it. Maybe it could be used with sugar cubes but I kind of doubt that is what the manufacturer had in mind...
customer_reviews.author: Frank H.

customer_reviews.title: The best tea set
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tea set. I like that it's environmentally friendly (made from milk jugs) and made in the USA. The size is perfect. You can even put them in the dishwasher...how cool is that? We like to have "real" tea parties. We use tea, milk or juice and we'll make some cupcakes or cookies to have with our tea. Sometimes we pretend we're having tea. It's fun that you can put actual tea or pretend with this set. Love this brand we have ordered more toys from them and they are all great quality.
customer_reviews.author: FallIsMyFav

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and all the pieces fit together well
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and all the pieces fit together well. This is the third tea set I have purchased for my granddaughter in the past two years, and this is the first set where the lid on the teapot doesn't fall off when tea is poured. For that fact alone, I gave it five stars because so many sets do not have parts that fit together well. The colors are soft and work well together. The tea pot is a totally universal item because of its shape and size. It can double as a soup, ice cream, or cereal bowl from which a child can sip liquid through the pour spout. Great fun--also an excellent tub toy.
customer_reviews.author: plain jane

customer_reviews.title: Stinky!
customer_reviews.text: Teapot REEKS of perfume/fabric softener. At first I thought it was the dish soap I used to clean it before the first use. I ran it through the dishwasher to see if that would work. Nope. Finally I went and looked at the poor reviews and I see I am not the only one. I will be returning, this cannot be safe. Too bad because my toddler really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah McLean

customer_reviews.title: It COULD be perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful play tea set, my daughter (2.5yo) LOVES it. It would be PERFECT with one small change. The creamer cup should be a different color. It is nearly identical in shape to the tea cups. Because of the closeness in shape and the same color, it REALLY frustrates my daughter that it doesn’t have its own green plate like the tea cups do. Ultimately, I needed to hide the creamer cup so she wouldn’t be bothered by it.
customer_reviews.author: L H

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute, practical, and fun
customer_reviews.text: Love that i can wash these in the dishwasher and use any kind of liquid my child wants to use during our tea parties. With other sets, we couldn't use even water because it would rust (so forget about washing them). Now we can use water, juice, milk, you name it. When we're done, i throw them in the dishwasher so they're ready for the next time. I appreciate how sturdy this set it as well. They won't bend or warp from being tossed or washed. Overall...they are durable, cute, practical and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Leifker

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA and love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s made in the USA. Colors are not coordinated but great. Quality is great. Finish is. Not smooth so no worrying over accidental scratches on cups , etc. Wish the sugar bowl didn’t have the two pin holes on bottom of container. The cover is NOT Airtight so not sure of the purpose Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea set for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for toddlers. My 3 yr old has been begging for a tea set. The others were breakable, pricey. This set has just the right items. Creamer, spoons, cups, pot, saucers, and sugar holder. Very thick, durable plastic. Easy to wash. Kids can’t break it. They spent all day playing with it, and continue to hold interest in “tea time.” Only reason for 4 stars is I wish it had come in a basket or something to contain it.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Best tea set
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-olds have had a Melissa and Doug tea set for awhile but it got wrecked outside. I got this one and it’s so much better. They love it. It’s just really substantial, colorful plastic, and we’ve used it as both a bath toy and a regular toy, and this is just a great, high-quality set, they’ve played with it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lifehack G

customer_reviews.title: My Niece Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my two-year-old niece. I figure this is ultimately more "usable" than the porcelain sets (albeit not as fancy), plus it is made of "safe" plastic. My daughter loves to drink real liquid from her tea set AND then use it in the bath, so I wanted to ensure my niece had the same flexibility in how she uses this tea set. This set lets you transition from all phases of play with a simple hand wash. I'm happy. She's happy. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea set
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this tea set. The colors are appealing and my kids play with it over and over again. I love that it is food safe. My kids drink tea and love having real tea parties. It’s great that they can’t break these. We have two sets so we can accommodate 8 guests at our tea parties. I have also given this as a first birthday present. I will probably give this as a gift over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edward Mcauliffe, III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Sturdy! Green!
customer_reviews.text: Love green toys for all they stand for-and how well they are made! This set does not bend, break, or crack-and will easily pass down through three kids without issue. There are tiny holes in the bottom of some of the items so it is not a set that you can use “for real”-heads up on that-but the cups hold liquid, and the set is worth the money, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: C Badge

customer_reviews.title: Daughter plays with this everyday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my one year old (I know the recommended age is 2+ but she’s always supervised). She loves this whole set and plays with it everyday. She loves stirring anything that looks like a container with the little spoons. It’s durabele - a tea cup accidentally went through the washing machine and came out good as new. I bought the dish set as well because she likes it so much. I will be buying more Green Tots in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Aratay

customer_reviews.title: really nice set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 y.o. grand daughter's birthday, but I ended up returning this because my daughter-in-law preferred a ceramic tea set ... which I was fine with. But this is a very nice unbreakable tea set ... somewhat bigger than most of the ceramic ones ... I recommend it if you don't mind it is plastic ....
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: Perfume-y smell
customer_reviews.text: This product does have a perfume-y smell, as some reviews state. Hopefully I'll be able to wash it out. Disappointed that sugar bowl has holes in lid and bowl, didn't realize this when I bought it, and don't understand how it's a "safety thing". Other than that it's a nice set, if the smell comes out it'll be almost perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C-squared

customer_reviews.title: Green Toys Tea Set is loved
customer_reviews.text: This tea set has been used every day since I gave it to my four year old granddaughter a week ago. The pot is larger than I thought it would be and the cups sit down nice. Yes, her two year old sister knocks her cup over, but at her age she would knock any cup over. I think four is a good age for a tea set. The set is made of nice weight plastic, the lids fit nice, the spoons are nice size. The pastel color set is very pretty. I plan on buying more sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 18 month old daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased for my daughters Halloween costume (Alice from Alice in Wonderland) but now it is easily one of her most favorite toys. These are safe to use with food so I put snacks in the teapot for her. She loves opening and closing the teapot and both pretend and actually drinking from the little tea cups. She even plays with the tea cup while taking a bath. Great quality and Too cute! I would definitely purchase again and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AZtoCALI

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and size!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea set! I researched to find a set that was safe to use with real tea and food and this one is free of chemicals and meets fda food contact standards. The tea pot holds quite a bit of liquid and the cups are a good size as well allowing my husband, myself and our 2 and 6 year old to have fun little tea parties together. The sugar container does have little holes at the bottom, as I read on other reviews. All I had to do was add a small piece of scotch tape on the bottom of the bowl, over the holes and it works just fine for sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This set is so sturdy and cute! I especially love that it is food and dishwasher safe. I bought it for my little niece and I am excited that it is a set that can grow with her and hopefully last a long time. My only complaint is the hole in the sugar dish, but it’s not a big deal and I think sugar cubes would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Punctured holes "for safety"
customer_reviews.text: Five star product but the people sugar canister arrived with four punctured holes. I didn't see this in any other pictures or description so my initial guess was I got a defect. We own a lot of green toys and it's a great brand but these holes don't look correct. Update: I contacted Green Toys customer service and was informed the holes are for "safety reasons". I'm still disappointed to see them on the lid, though, as I can't see holes on any other cannister lid in product pictures or in product description.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this tea set. It is made from recycled plastic (which is great!) plus feels sturdy and of good quality. The textured surface makes each item easier to hold as they have kind of a non-slip feel. The cups and tea pot are a great size for small children (my granddaughter is 5); not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Bodecoa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have bought numerous tea sets for my daughters, and this was the first one I've bought for a granddaughter. The quality of the tea set is heavy duty and not some cheap plastic they can drop or step of and crack. Very impressed with this tea set.
customer_reviews.author: rachpack

customer_reviews.title: You may not get the color you order in this great tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tea set. Sturdy. No stupid stickers to peel off. It’s fun in the bathtub and at the swimming pool. And it’s dishwasher safe on upper rack. I will definitely buy again. So, why 4 stars instead of 5? It is not the color pictured. The one I ordered. The one I was sent is primary colors. Which is fine. I guess. It’s just that out of my awesome, wonderful, 8 grandkids I have one girl. When I order pink and purple I want pink and purple. We have plenty primary colors toys. But other than color this tea set is perfect!! Almost.
customer_reviews.author: Momma deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set. I love the durability and the fact that it's made of recycled milk jugs and so is a safer plastic than most toys. I like that my daughter can play with water in it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and unbreakable tea set
customer_reviews.text: Great for the water table, bath and regular tea parties. What I like about this is that the set can be used to pour water and have "tea". although i try not to let her drink the bathwater tea. I just wish the creamer was either a different color than the cups, or perhaps a slightly larger size. We use cotton balls for sugar cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Jade

customer_reviews.title: Best toy this year
customer_reviews.text: My toddler love this, for the very first time she is sitting there and play by herself for almost a hour! Of course there is water everywhere lol, but this is the only toy she can play for that long, so well worth it. Very easy to clean I just throw in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Mingming Sun

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and food safe!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as expected from this company! Can be used with real tea or other liquid and then wash it! Bigger size than other tea sets so we can enjoy real food together! Will last a long time without breaking, unlike other flimsy plastic or rusting metal sets. Love these and so do my kids!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set I have gifted to a toddler and they each loved it every time. They are just the right size for them and very durable. They like them more than their pretty patterned teeny weeny tea sets that are too small even for their little hands. They are perfectly proportioned for toddlers and little girls to play.
customer_reviews.author: Safferdian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a play therapist and she is so excited she found this brand. She plans to get lots of use out of it. First with tea parties between her and my son and then it is sturdy and durable to transition for her work.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great set that my kiddos can safely drink out of!
customer_reviews.text: We drink a lot of tea in my house and my daughter has taken a real interest in our tea cups. We have several "play" tea sets, but for some reason all of the cups have holes in them from where they were held into the packaging. I wanted something we could actually put liquid in for her so she can drink "tea" with us. This set fit the bill: they are food safe, can be washed in the dishwasher and look adorable.
customer_reviews.author: MPA

customer_reviews.title: Smells, wish I had returned, using as a water toy instead
customer_reviews.text: The teapot and sugar bowl smell very strongly of fragrance. I was hoping to put milk or water inside for the kids to drink, but they just end up tasting like perfume. After hand-washing and going through the dishwasher multiple times, it still smells. I'll let them drink from the cups, but now I need to buy a different pitcher or teapot.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P

customer_reviews.title: absolutly perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 and a half and is now addicted to tea!! Fortunatly for me the tea is free or I would be having a huge problem!. This is exactly what I had hoped for when we chose it. THe set is complete with spoons saucers cream and sugar. It is a ton of fun and my daughter LOVES it. To date we have had over 200 pots of tea (she got this for Christmas) and we are still going strong. Quality built with plenty of details. If you love tes this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it but me
customer_reviews.text: It’s probably only me but I have a hard time seeing why everyone love this product. I bought 3 of them over the years but didn’t felt like giving to my kids. I kept in the garage and they always made a good last minute birthday gift 😉
customer_reviews.author: laispriolli

customer_reviews.title: Tea set is nicely colored and granddaughter liked it up to a point
customer_reviews.text: Tea set is nicely colored and granddaughter liked it up to a point. Teapot does leak, so water was spilt all over. Question: Why does the sugar container have 3 holes in the bottom of the bowl? Sugar falls through the holes. Created another mess. I will not recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my 18 month old daughter and she loves it! All of the pieces are the perfect size for little hands and the quality/material is top notch. Amazon had a lighting deal on this set so I got it for a phenomenal price even though I would have paid regular price for this set!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy, & great size- perfect for pretend play!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tea set! This toy is so much fun for pretend play and goes along well with her Step 2 play kitchen (the teapot is similar in size to the pots that came with her kitchen). It's sturdy and seems like it will hold up well. Some of the little tin tea sets look really small but this is the perfect size for play. I like that it comes with so many pieces, too, like the little spoons to stir the tea. So glad we chose this set!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Tea Set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter's birthday. She's just 1 yr old, but is already playing with this with her Mum. Never too young! I also bought 2 story books to go along with the gift - "My Very First Tea Party" and "Olivia Plans a Tea Party". Next time I visit, I look forward to tea with my wee one! Well made, ecologically sensible, great tea set for young hands.
customer_reviews.author: Gooby

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I got the tea set to help entertain my kiddos during the stay at home order. They LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 22 month old
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are well made, light weight, but very durable. The colors are very vibrant. My 22 month old daughter doesn't like toys that make a lot of noise. She's really getting into pretend play and this was a huge hit. This set also works well as a bath toy. You don't have to worry about water getting trapped inside the pieces and growing mold and mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Morris & Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Made extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Made very well I was actually surprised at the quality. My daughter loves pretending to drink coffee with me..she enjoyed this product more than I ever would've imagined. Great for growing minds to pretend with
customer_reviews.author: Teagan

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sturdy and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I just love Green Toys quality and sturdiness. Super strong and thick. Perfect for little hands and washes up super easy! Wish there was a case to store it in-but just bought a container from the dollar store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When simple is better
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a child to whom my daughter is a non-biological "aunt." My daughter reported back to me that the girl loves it, and her mother really likes the "green" aspects of it. The set is plain in appearance, but I prefer that to so many children's toys these days that are electric/electronic, leaving the child with little room for using his or her imagination.
customer_reviews.author: But I digress...

customer_reviews.title: 100% waste free!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I love how strong and durable the product is and the fact that it is made from recycled products, even the packaging was waste free which is amazing! Can not recommend this tea set enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tea set out there
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about green toys and this tea set doesn’t disappoint! We just bought this for my daughter for Christmas to replace the cheap tea set her grandma got her that was already bent and broken after only about a year of use. This set is cute yet quality and is great for the price. My daughter loves to have tea parties with this and the cupcake set.
customer_reviews.author: Popmakr4

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 15 month old daughter. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 month old daughter. There are no small parts, nothing she can choke on. She loves it. She carries the spoons around and pretends to eat random imaginary food, and spends hours taking the lids off of the sugar bowl and tea pot, and putting them back on. The tea pot does NOT leak, after so many reviews I immediately checked it when it arrived. There is nowhere for it to leak from. The sugar bowl does have tiny holes in the bottom, so I would suggest if you're going to put sugar in it use cubes.
customer_reviews.author: RMONROY

customer_reviews.title: Great, great tea set well worth it
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this teaset. I bought this for my 2 year old goddaughter and she immediately busted it open and started playing. My 2.5 year old son was more than happy to start playing with her too. The pieces are durable, soft, and overall a great set. I liked the packaging too, it was very easy to open but safely kept from moving. I bought a second teaset (a different version), for my niece, and the Green Toys Tea Set was way better in my opinion. I paid $14 for the Green Toys set, and it was way better quality than the $19 set. I highly recommend this set. I really think it would last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Romero

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids and so far they LOVE it! The teapot holds a normal size coffee cup of hot cocoa so it can be shared by both of them and is plenty instead of throwing away what they don't want to drink! I will have to buy another set for them to take home too! Such fun!
customer_reviews.author: N. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands.
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter loves this tea set!. Feel good purchasing something BPA Free, Phthalates Free. No smell (as some reviewers claimed). Durable - expect to last through several children. Very happy with the price, compared to similar items out there, that had fair ratings.
customer_reviews.author: J Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for real tea parties with your kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It was exactly what I was looking for. My daughter (6) and son (3) have been enjoying playing tea time with a plastic toy set before but my daughter wanted to have real drinks. I wanted something that would be food safe but not easily breakable. So far we have used it for hot chocolate and used the sugar bowl for marshmallows. This set is perfect and is even dishwasher safe. Although, so far I have only washed it by hand. I love the mix of colors too because it has everyone's favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Eem

customer_reviews.title: Simple toy that encourages creative play
customer_reviews.text: The Green Toys Tea Set is food safe in addition to being colorful enough to make it into the play rotation. It's the perfect set for my three year old daughter, since she will frequently ask for her snack in the cups that she's playing with. After a quick wash and rinse, a tea cup is ready to serve bowl duty while my daughter shovels pretzels or puffs into her mouth. Over the past year, this set has proven to be durable enough to withstand frequent washing and my daughter's no-so-tender loving care. I would recommend this toy tea set.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best tea set! ☕️
customer_reviews.text: This is our favorite, we use it for all of our tea parties. I bought it for my daughter and gifted it to five of of our favorite little girls. It is good quality, and we can really use it, but also let it be played with and not worry about breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Best tea sets I’ve purchased!
customer_reviews.text: My 5year old loved them even me ! They are so cute and sturdy no smell to them and you can wash them with out worrying they can get ruined like other tea sets . Great gift !Great for Pretend tea time pretend restaurant ! Don’t think about it !
customer_reviews.author: Mariela

customer_reviews.title: Great for "real"  tea parties
customer_reviews.text: This tea set is really great for 2yr + I love it is Meets FDA food contact standards so can be used for a real tea party, not just pretend This is toddler size, but cups are big enough to hold It states for 3 yrs and up but my 27 month old niece loved it and had no problem playing with it. The next day after she opened her gift, I saw her 4-1/2 yr old brother drinking his water from the cup and holding the saucer under the cup with other hand - so cute ! I did not measure how much cup holds - I'm guessing 4-5 ounces Definitely on my highly recommend list
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little tea set!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set and it's 'green', so no worries about chemicals getting into those little hands. Colorful and lightweight; actually holds liquid if your child doesn't like 'pretend' tea. Exactly as expected. Very many happy tea parties to come, as they look extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set!
customer_reviews.text: Darling tea set that doesn’t leave any guilt! I love this toy brand for what it is, recycled, functional, cute, plastic toys. These are sturdy, colorful, and well loved by my toddler! I got this as a lightning deal which makes the whole thing that much sweeter!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love this set. We also have the cooking set. Wonderful for the imagination.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter Absolutely loves this set. She is 2, and always was trying to use different toys, to bring me a drink or bite of something. So, when I saw this set, I had to get it. I am a Huge Fan of this company.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Keen

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but has a major flaw.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but sugar bowl has holes in it! I cannot understand why this would be designed this way? How can you fill with sugar? Edit: I contacted Green Toys customer service, and they explained the holes are made to prevent suffocation, so it's a safety feature. They advised using sugar cubes, which is fine by me. I hope I can easily find sugar cubes now.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Busy Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for a 2 year old Birthday, she LOVED IT!! Everyone loved how she stayed busy serving everyone. My Kenyan Brother said he could feel her joy at serving everyone & wondered how I thought of such a gift. It was such a hit we bought another set for our Sisters daughter when she turned 3. The feedback was the same, a huge hit with everyone being served. Meanwhile the 2 year old & friends are now putting dried leaves in the cups as the pretend play. A great toy & actually functional also!
customer_reviews.author: Atieno

customer_reviews.title: Great little tea set...that’s eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: I had these in my cart for a while. They were a little pricey, but luckily around Xmas time amazon had a lightning deal for 1/2 the listed price! Needless to say I snatched them up quickly. I bought this for my 20 month old daughter. Very good quality, I love the simplistic packaging it comes in. LOVE the fact is made from recycled plastic. Very durable thick plastic. My daughter loves her tea set! Happy baby happy mommy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter for Christmas. She loves them! Very durable and nice looking. We even put water in the teapot and practice pouring it without spilling into the cups. I will definitely purchase from this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Coy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea set!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say enough about this wonderful little tea set! My four year old LOVES hot tea and always wants to do it all herself. With this set I can turn her loose and let her pour cup after cup of tea. This is bpa free and food safe, so no worries there. It is dishwasher safe, and honestly I have washed it day after day with no wear on it. It's also super cute and she is thrilled with it. The little pieces are all so well made and I expect it to hold up for a long time, so I'm thrilled as well.
customer_reviews.author: girlfriday

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tea Set!
customer_reviews.text: I first heard of Green Toys through my Citrus Lane subscription and I received a set which included a pot, ladle, and spatula. These items are made in the USA, which was the first plus. Second, they are dishwasher safe which has to be the smartest, most useful idea in manufacturing toys for children. They constantly put things in their mouth and having the ease of putting the items in the dishwasher is just wonderful! I bought this to replace my daughter's cheaply made plastic tea set and this definitely does not disappoint!! The pieces are well made and stack well (with the exception of the cups). Overall, a great set!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Green Toys produces some of the most amazing, quality children's toys on the market! The quality can withstand hours and hours of play and they are always able to be shared by multiple children! ALL of this is on top of the fact that they produce toys you can feel good about your children playing with that you can trust are not full of harmful chemicals and bpa! You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krobinson0301

customer_reviews.title: Holes in the sugar bowl
customer_reviews.text: Nice set however I would like to know why they had to put holes in the bottom of the sugar bowl. I do not always read the reviews before I purchase. I was in a hurry. If this product is food safe it stands that it might be used for the purpose it was made. I will most likely return.
customer_reviews.author: shoppin'

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to do tea parties with her doll as well as friends, so, I purchased this set. It arrived in perfect condition. I loved that it is really made of good quality, recycled material. It is durable, strong and BPA free. They are good, even when she plays rough, wont break easily. I gives her water in her tea pot and she loves to pretend play tea party with it. Loved it!
customer_reviews.author: shiney2015

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally high quality, environmentally conscious
customer_reviews.text: Our son plays "tea cups" at a friend's house and loves it, so we got him his own set. Green Toys' quality can't be beat. There is nothing cheap about this set. Everything that it is packaged in is recyclable and made from recycled materials, as well as the set itself. I found this set to be barely (if at all) more expensive than other, cheaper feeling sets. If corporate responsibility is something you champion (I'm not as concerned with it as I probably should be, but all things being equal, I default to the more environmentally friendly product), this set and company should be at the top of your list.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Emerson Brackney

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift for pretend play
customer_reviews.text: I saw these at PBKids and they were cheaper here so I ordered a box. They are sturdy and beautiful. The size is very good for a kid too. I just wish they came in just pink color like the ones I saw in PBKids instead of too many colors.
customer_reviews.author: Yaser A.

customer_reviews.title: chews and sucks on them
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 8 months and she loves this tea set! She plays w the spoons and plates, chews and sucks on them. They are light and make a nice noise when she clatters them together. I like that she's playing with "real life" things, ie tea cups, spoons, saucers, tea pot and that when she is older this toy will still be relevant for her and she can have "tea parties!" Functionally great too. You can wash them and the kids can even eat or drink from them. Very safe and green too...plus plus! Love it
customer_reviews.author: cel

customer_reviews.title: Great tea set, nice larger size!
customer_reviews.text: We love this non toxic colorful tea set! If only the dog hadn't chewed up the lid to the tea pot. But seriously, they are virtually unbreakable and oversized so you can really have a cup of tea (not teeny tiny like some sets) and my kids love to have tea parties and use them for other things too like feeding their dolls or just drinking water out of. I only hand wash them so not sure if they can go in the dishwasher or not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tea Set for Toddler (& Food/Beverage Safe)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a two-year old's birthday. BPA-free and safe to use with real food and beverages. The shape of the teapot, cups and plates are easy for little fingers to manage and they are robust! Other tea sets are more appropriate for older children. I was happy to find this set for a toddler and she seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: Still almost 2 years later, these look brand new! My daughter uses them as bath toys so they are constantly used and exposed to water and soap several times a week. They wash well, have barely any signs of wear, and still in excellent condition. Green Toys brand really is the best!
customer_reviews.author: SherBear

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My kids 1 and 3 year olds love this tea set. They play with it alone, but they really love when we have family tea parties. I love that the whole set is dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, pieces, shapes and material of this little tea set. My one complaint is that it's confusing for the creamer to be the same color as the cups. My daughter doesn't care, but I'm a little too type A to not have everything clearly delineated. Overall, it's the best set I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: zee bees knees

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea set for girls or boys
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for a tea set that was gender neutral (not that I cared that much about the color, but I thought "hey! Why are they all pink and purple with flowers and pixie dust!?"). This set is perfect. It is made of very durable (and recycled!) Plastic and is dishwasher safe. This last point is key when you realize that one of your child's favorite things to do at his "tea party" is to add goldfish to the water and forget to tell me for three days :-). As most toys made by Green Toys, it will be a keeper for a long time. Thanks for the great products!
customer_reviews.author: L. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea set!
customer_reviews.text: Recycled plastic, made in the U.S., food safe and dishwasher safe. I love that the items are safe and convenient to use for an actual tea party, not just for show. The small tea cups are also perfect for letting a toddler prsctice drinking from an open cup (unless they've overfilled rhat cup pouring from the tea pot--but, hey, they're developing fine motor skills so it's a mess with a good purpose). Love this set so much I also purchased the cookware set for my daughter's play kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: ashsalt

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy set. Super cute, and lots of fun for my toddler niece. These pieces can definitely take a beating, and I love that they come in cute colors and are food-safe!! Incredible value in this set, and a fantastic price. I would buy again and again, but I don't expect this set will be wearing out anytime in the next two generations of tea-partying toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Liz P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my 2.5 yr old grand-daughter. She loved it. She was more excited about this tea set than anything she got for Christmas! It’s durable, just the right size for her hands and the colors are great. I looked at the tin tea sets and was worried with her possibly leaving them outside or using them for really tea they would rust. I decided on this set. I’m so glad I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Graham

customer_reviews.title: Coffee, Tea, or...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my granddaughter. I looked all over for a non-toxic tea set. The old-fashioned tin ones are dangerous; the China ones are breakable, but this one was perfect. I love the company and their determination to go green using non-toxic, recyclable material. My granddaughter loves the set and uses it often. The only problem is she insists on tea and I would prefer coffee. C'est la vie
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this, she got it for her first birthday! She loves trying to drink from the teacups. What’s not to love about recycled toys?
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Mays

customer_reviews.title: A hit with our granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with our 21 month old granddaughter. She played with this set every day for 2 weeks while visiting. She loved to make us pretend tea and have tea parties. I couldn't believe how she never tired of it. I purchased it because it was bpa and phthalates free which was another bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea party set
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loves to have tea parties and this set is perfect for that. When she wants to play tea party the set is perfect, and when she doesn't want to have a tea party but would rather throw them on the floor the set more than survives!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Harbers

customer_reviews.title: it's a quality set and the colors are fun.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and loves playing with them. My only complaint is that for two pieces that come with tops, the tops are really hard to lift off, the little piece is too stubby and small even for my fingers, let alone a small child's. But other than that, it's a quality set and the colors are fun.
customer_reviews.author: Vida

customer_reviews.title: Best tea set I have found
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best toy tea set! I had bought 2 tea set before buying this one and was disappointed by both sets. But with this tea set I was very satisfied. The plastic is thick and sturdy. Well designed simple style is easy for young kids to use as well as adults.
customer_reviews.author: Sinopa82

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for interactive play
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this tea set. She got it at 14 months and still loves it at 18 months. She plays with it every single day. We have tea parties with her animals. We have tea parties with friends. She serves her grandparents tea over Face Time and Skype. Very sturdy and well made. Love the lids on the tea pot and sugar bowl. My only complaint is that the creamer is blue like the tea cups rather than purple like the sugar bowl. It makes it harder to stand out as the creamer is almost the same shape as the tea cups. But otherwise, it is perfect and she uses it constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great set but sugar bowl has holes :(
customer_reviews.text: Loved this set. Said it was usable and dishwasher safe. Four stars because the sugar bowl and lid both have 2 holes in them. If it is usable not sure why the holes. If we put anything in this bowl it is going to make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, easy to clean, very cute tea set! You can play pretend, or actually put water into the tea pot without trouble. Always a fan of Green Toys, but this has to be one of my favorites. You do have to be careful not to fill the teapot too full, or when you put the lid on it will squirt the water out of the spout; however this also keeps the water from just spilling out if it gets knocked over when "tea time" inevitably becomes "drawing time" with a toddler. Very very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Safe Tea Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute durable little tea set. I wanted my niece to have a tea set for her little pretend tea parties, but didn't want to worry about anything breaking and hurting her. Also, I didn't want to worry about what she might be putting in her mouth. This little set is safe. It's plastic so there's nothing to break and potentially harm a child. It's environmentally friendly. Dishwasher safe. And it's safe to use with water and such for make believe.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use at the beach and it has not disappointed. My kids could play for hours and the durability is outstanding. Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun set. I bought this to go with my son's Ikea kitchen. He plays with both every day! He pours him self tea, pours coffee for me, and even gets cheese to sip out of his play kitchen faucet!! Totally winning at imaginative play!! This set is easy to clean and perfectly sized for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kate in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible tea set
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this tea set! She pretends to eat and drink and feeds her stuffed animals. The only downside is that the spoons are just the right size to fit down the vents in our apartment, so we had to take the remaining ones away.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Snyder

product_meta.title: Green Toys Tea Set - BPA Free, Phthalates Free Play Toys for Gross Motor, Fine Skills Development. Kitchen Toys
product_meta.description:
If you are concerned about improving the motor skills of your child, then opt for Green Toys Tea Set. This tea set is made using environment friendly materials including recycled plastic without BPA, phthalates or PVC — safe for earth and your child. This 17-piece set includes lidded tea pot and sugar bowl, a creamer, four cups, four saucers, and four spoons. The toy set meets FDA food contact standards and is great for serving shakes, juices or soups. Tea toy set is a perfect way for boosting hunger of your kids as they would love being served in these cute little toys.

AMAZON.COM
By using the Green Toys Tea Set, your preschooler can help save the planet – a cup of tea at a time. Designed for children ages three and up, the tea set is made from recycled milk jugs, is FDA approved to eat and drink from, and does not contain BPA, phthalates, or lead paint. The set is colorful and durable, and is ideal for bath-time tea parties.

 


Colorful and 100% Recycled
This authentically styled tea set comes in pastel colors with interchangeable lids for the pot and sugar bowl. The lightweight set is made out of a durable recycled material. Manufactured, assembled, and tested in the United States, the set is environmentally safe, non-toxic, and dishwasher friendly. Another highlight of this tea set is the recycled cardboard packaging it comes in, which you can also recycle when you're through with it. With no plastic or twisting ties -- or any of the other environmentally unfriendly annoyances that come with opening up toy packaging -- it's easy to open and .

 Help the Environment
With the Green Toys Tea Set, you can feel better about your purchase since you're doing something good to help the environment. It's safe and durable for your child's use -- especially when eating or drinking from the set.

 Use the tea set to help your child learn more about recycling, helping the environment, saving energy, and reducing greenhouse gases while they serve tea to family and friends.

 Besides the environmental benefits, the set is brightly colored, lightweight, and durable -- making it a tea set that will last for years to come.

 What's in the Box
Tea pot with lid, sugar bowl with lid, creamer, four cups, four saucers, and four teaspoons.

 





FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Talk about green tea. Young hosts can serve up a pot of tea while doing something really good for the earth. Like all Green Toys products, our Tea Set is made from eco-friendly materials, helping to reduce fossil fuel use and CO2 emissions, all in the name of Good Green Fun. Meets FDA specs for food contact. Dishwasher safe.

See more
feature_bullets: Durable Tea Toy: this toy set meets FDA food contact standards and ensures durability, strength and safety. This tea set can also be used for serving milk, shakes or soups to your kids

What is in the Package: this toy set includes a tea pot: 4-1/2 in. D, 3-1/2 in. H; a sugar bowl with lid: 3 in. D, 1-1/4 in. H; tea cups and creamer: 2-1/4 in. D, 1-3/4 in. H; a saucer: 4 in. D utensils: 4-1/4 in. L — 17 pieces in total
Toy Set Utility: this toy is designed for encouraging gross and fine motor skills development in children. It will help them learn how to sort and arrange things the better way

Safe Toy: this green toy is made using environmental friendly materials including 100% recycled plastic. Contains no BPA, phthalates or PVC; safe for earth and your child. Tea set is packaged with recyclable materials and printed with soy inks
East to Clean: green toys tea set is dishwasher safe and easy to clean. Use mild baby soaps or shampoo to clean the tea set

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
